description:
Retain full control on icy roads, even on tight turns and under hard braking. These studded tires make your winter rides safer, taking a little anxiety out of your commute. The spikes work best on ice when running at minimum pressure. At maximum pressure, you can ride these tires on ice-free roads with minimal noise.

  • Winter specific rubber compound stays softer in cold temperatures
  • 5mm SmartGuard for puncture resistance
  • 240 spikes have a tungsten carbide core for durability
  • To ensure that spikes are permanently fixed, tires should be run in for about 40km on asphalt while avoiding any fast acceleration or heavy braking
  • Maximum rider weight 100kg
  • e-Bike compatible up to 25kph
name: Schwalbe Marathon Winter Plus 26 x 1.75in. SmartGuard Studded Wire Tire
